name: GreenForce-Player Protected Media File
summary: Learn about .GFP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GFP files can be decrypted and played back in the GreenForce-Player by entering the password that was used to encrypt the data.

description: Audio or video file created by GreenForce-Player, a free multimedia player; stores the multimedia data using a proprietary DRM copyright protection technique; includes password protection and may contain metadata.
